text: Budlong may refer to: ==People== * Charles A. Budlong (1859–1947), American politician * Clarence R. Budlong (1874–1946), American tennis player * Frederick G. Budlong (1881–1953), American bishop * Robert Davol Budlong (1902–1955), American industrial designer * S. W. Budlong, American politician ==Places== * Budlong Creek, New York, United States * Budlong Farm, Rhode Island, United States ==Other== * Budlong Pickle Company, American pickle company
